Class BehaviourStrategyBase

java.lang.Object
Models.BehaviourStrategies.BehaviourStrategyBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
BehaviourStrategy
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggressiveStrategy, BenevolentStrategy, CheaterStrategy, HumanStrategy, RandomStrategy
public abstract class BehaviourStrategyBase extends Object implements BehaviourStrategy

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    advance_issue_order(String[] p_commandTokens)
    This method is called for advance orders, check if advance order is possible If possible it adds the advance order to the player's order list.
    protected void
    airlift_issue_order(String[] p_commandTokens)
    This method is called for airlift orders, check if the airlift order is possible If possible it adds the airlift order to the player's order list.
    protected void
    blockade_issue_order(String[] p_commandTokens, WarMap p_map)
    This method is called for blockade orders, check if the destination country exists If true create a new order and executses in blockadeOrder and finally removes the blockade card from player cards.

  • Method Details

    • diplomacy_issue_order

      protected void diplomacy_issue_order(String[] p_commandTokens, WarMap p_map, List<Player> p_list)
      This method is called for diplomacy orders, checks if the target player name exists. If true, add the player name to diplomacy list, which will be checked before other order execution.
      Parameters:
      p_commandTokens - The order command input
      p_map - The WarMap
      p_list - The PlayerList

    • blockade_issue_order

      protected void blockade_issue_order(String[] p_commandTokens, WarMap p_map)
      This method is called for blockade orders, check if the destination country exists If true create a new order and executses in blockadeOrder and finally removes the blockade card from player cards.
      Parameters:
      p_commandTokens - The order command input
      p_map - The WarMap

    • bomb_issue_order

      protected void bomb_issue_order(String[] p_commandTokens, WarMap p_map)
      The method which creates a bomb order command.
      Parameters:
      p_commandTokens - input command.
      p_map - current map.

    • advance_issue_order

      protected void advance_issue_order(String[] p_commandTokens)
      This method is called for advance orders, check if advance order is possible If possible it adds the advance order to the player's order list.
      Parameters:
      p_commandTokens - The order command input

    • airlift_issue_order

      protected void airlift_issue_order(String[] p_commandTokens)
      This method is called for airlift orders, check if the airlift order is possible If possible it adds the airlift order to the player's order list.
      Parameters:
      p_commandTokens - The order command input

    • deploy_issue_order

      protected void deploy_issue_order(String[] p_commandTokens)
      This method is called for deploy orders, check if deploy order is possible If possible it adds the order to the players order list.
      Parameters:
      p_commandTokens - The order command input
